Title: Cryptographic Failures Lab – Peel the Onion
Description: EvilCorp has deployed layers of encryption and signature mechanisms to protect their internal systems. Your task is to peel back each layer of cryptographic misconfiguration and misuse, culminating in the full decryption of Thanos' sensitive report. Each step reveals new hints or access to the next challenge. Use standard tools like `curl`, `john`, and `ssh`, and bring your crypto A-game.

Challenges.Title: Step 1: Leaked Backup & MD5 Crack
Challenges.Description: Crack the MD5 password from a leaked SQLite DB.

Challenges.Title: Step 2: AES Vault Decryption
Challenges.Description: Decrypt the vault message using a known ECB key.

Challenges.Title: Step 3: JWT None Bypass
Challenges.Description: Forge a JWT using `alg: none` to gain access.

Challenges.Title: Step 4: XOR Message Tampering
Challenges.Description: Use known plaintext to recover and alter an XOR-encrypted blob.

Challenges.Title: Step 5: Crack the ZIP
Challenges.Description: Brute-force a password-protected ZIP to extract the flag.

Challenges.Title: Step 6: SHA1 Hash Crack
Challenges.Description: Find and crack Thanos' password from a leaked SHA1 hash in logs.

Challenges.Title: Step 7: RSA Decryption (Fermat)
Challenges.Description: Factor a weak RSA modulus and decrypt the final file.
